data.title: Free Chrome extension to download GameChanger clips - no more screen recording!
data.body:
Built ClipKeeper because I was frustrated with GameChanger's premium pricing just to download my kid's clips. One click downloads, smart file naming, works on highlights AND full games.

Free version: 5 downloads/week
Pro: $29/year unlimited

https://getclipkeeper.com
